column5: Very nice fishing trip/holiday !!!! great scenery pics & fish pics too !!!,  those bed & breakfast places sure sound good,i will have to try them one day,thanks for sharing...cheers
That's a great report, thanks for taking the time to put that together. Looks like you guys had a great time.  Craig
Looked like a great trip, thanks for the report and pic's...

Excellent report! Lots of great scenery shots and wildlife. I don't think I have ever seen a hummingbird land!  Sucks about your wife's inner ear problem. My fishing partner Mark has the same problem but more severe. He is on tons of medication.  Anyways, thanks for sharing.

Thanks for the replies everyone, glad you enjoyed it..  EC1 - pm sent.  JB - ya the inner ear problem is a drag but what can you do.  We pick and choose the the days that work for her and make the most of it.  Is your buddy on the meds all the time or just when he needs them?

Well it's about flippin time!!!! Man, I was waiting for the report before I left and I go away for a week and it finally shows up! Not like there's a lot of detail or pics or anything that could take time to do... LOL Great report Bud! Glad youse two had a great time. Obviously the kids had a blast... your a good man Will... so let's go fishin soon! HH
Looks like a fabulous time, thanks for posting.

All the time and the meds dont' help much. He needs them to sleep though. He's on Gravol, Serc(Sp?) and some heavy stuff for when its really bad. He's tried a ton of other medicine with no luck....He's also on a low salt diet, since everything he eats makes him nauseas....  They can't figure out whats wrong with him, but he thinks it might be meneres. From what I can tell, its affected by Barometric pressure. So there is some sort of blockage.  Its one of those areas(inner ear) the Doctors are unfamiliar with. This desease is indeed a major drag, with many ugly symptoms......  Well at least she is not letting it bring her down and enjoying life the best she can.

That sucks for your buddy JB.  Di seems to be OK for the most part if she has her sea bands on and some Gravol.  If it's a winding day she just stays on shore.  This trip was the first fishing trip she's done in about 3 or 4 years.  HH - We'll get out very soon.  Until then - where is your report?  I figure you still have a couple of weeks to get it together.  Oh!  We need pics.

HH - We'll get out very soon. Until then - where is your report? huh.gif I figure you still have a couple of weeks to get it together. Oh! We need pics. thumbsup_anim.gif  Come soon man... come soon! HH
Great report and lots of details and tons of pics  I sure enjoyed reading throught it and want to thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful trip. Leechman

Will...what a fantastic vacation!  You sure packed a lot into the time you had up there.  It even looked like Di enjoyed herself as well....LOL.  Those notes from those kids are just priceless....when they appreciate things enough to put that kind of effort into letting you know, then you know you've made a positive influence on them.  Great scenery, great people (that's cool about the Duff thing), and great times....just what vacations are supposed to be!
Great report. Beautiful scenery and some nice fish.
great report and awesome pics

Amazing report dude.  Not only were the pics great, but your description of the general area and hospitable diners are amazing and handy for my next trip that way.  Thanks for sharing your vacation with us.  Looks like an amazing time in an equally amazing place.
great report and pictures
Amazing report, beautiful pics.  Seeing the pics, I can't wait to get back up there myself in Sept once I pin down some dates.  Thanks for the report and glad you had such a wonderful vacation.
That was an awesome report!!  Really puts my crappy ones into perspective  :)  Anytime I travel over the French on the 69 I get a huge smile and feel like a kid again!
Awesome. Nothing else I can add! Just awesome.
Great report and awesome pictures!
Wow great report, thanks for all the details and wonderful pictures.
woww, you got some amazing pictures here! Love the ones of the humming bird, you must have a really nice camera. Haha. Lovin the color of that pike too.

What an adventure report!! I think you made two young fellas's very happy with your hospitality, what goes around comes around! Never been brave enough to stay at BB's but after reading this and the fine people you've met on your excursions might have to rethink things. Thanks for the post and pics.   Cheers, 1leg
What a truely great report Will, I felt like I was right there with you two.  Those thank you notes are priceless for sure.  Thanks for sharing your vacation.  Joey

Will...your pictures are beautiful and bring me home (wait...that was home)  As the mother of Cameron, that firey redhead, I would like to thank you.  Cameron talked non-stop about you, fishing, cleaning the fish, tubing, your  boat, everything for a week after you left.  Your generosity to the boys will not soon be forgotten.  He proudly called me to inform me you had taught him to clean the bass and you have given him the gift of wonderful memories from this summer.   He was only to stay an extra week after you left and I feel like we have lost him forever to the north.  HA!!  Anyhow.  My father passed the link onto to me and I just wanted to say thank you.
i've never been to the french area, but driven trhough many times   its such a gorgeous area.  glad u had fun
Wow! I feel like I was there. What a great report, and what a great vacation (and what great ambassadors you two are). Jim
great report, thanks for taking the time!
Fantastic trip guys! At the 69 rest stop you could stretch your legs and hike down the river a bit to Recollet falls.
Awesome report man.  Tons of great pics there.  Thanks for puttin' 'em all up.   Really emjoyed it.
Awesome report and I loved you ton of pics.    Thanks for takin' the time to put 'em up.
Great report thanks for sharing
Very nice report and pics!!!
Great report...amazing pictures...I want to have breakfast on that deck...and good on you for giving two boys great memories.
what a great report!!!!  thanks for the awesome detail and great pics!  Cheers!

NICE ! GOOD FISH AND ALL.  is your wife a teacher? i think she teaches at my school ! SURPRISING TO SEE MY TEACHER ON THIS FORUM ! LOL  too bad she doesnt know my name as i only see her once in a while in school
